author: publisher5
title: Shipping Corporation of India Ltd Recruitment 2017 – General Assistant Posts

organizations.name: general assistant posts shipping corporation of india ltd

text: Shipping Corporation of India Ltd Recruitment 2017 – General Assistant Posts Shipping Corporation of India Ltd Recruitment 2017 – General Assistant Posts: Shipping Corporation of India Ltd, Personnel & Administration Division has announced a notification   General Assistant vacancies on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 16-01-2017. Other details like how to apply are given below… Shipping Corporation of India Ltd Vacancy Details: Name of the Post: General Assistant How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their application in prescribed format along with relevant copies/ documents to The Shipping Corporation of India, 509 suite, 5th Floor, No.1 Alie Street, London E1 8DE on or before 16-01-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Applications: 16-01-2017. For more details like job profile, tenure & other information click on the link given below…
